original_text: Their relatives lived in their villages. They came to Jerusalem to help with the work as guards. Each time that they came, they worked there for seven days.
korean_text: 그들의 마을에 있는 형제들은 이레마다 와서 그들과 함께 있으니

sentences.original_text: Their relatives lived in their villages.
They came to Jerusalem to help with the work
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 일을 돕기 위해 예루살렘에 왔습니다

sentences.original_text: they worked there for seven days.
